title: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: The dialog details contain the following issues: 
i. The duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page.
ii. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB:
The observed behavior is as follows:
a. The buttons are too small.
b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is pre-selected, but both move buttons are enabled.
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
d. The dialog appears oversized for methods with many parameters.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the modify parameters dialog.
2. Change a parameter name to something very long and observe the cut-off preview.
